mapper.select: select ku0.nickname as userNickname, ku1.nickname as inviterNickname, kc.name as groupNickname from khl_group_invite kci left join khl_user_info ku0 on kci.user_id = ku0.id left join khl_user_info ku1 on kci.inviter_id = ku1.id left join khl_group kc on kci.group_id = kc.id where kci.user_id = #{userId};
